actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to complete a data matching agreement with the Secretary of Education in order to ensure individuals who are current or former active-duty military service members or civilian employees and are otherwise eligible for assistance under the public service loan forgiveness program have their periods of employment automatically certified and counted towards the public service loan forgiveness program.
short_title: Ensuring Military Access to Higher Education Benefits Act of 2023
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Ensuring Military Access to Higher Education Benefits Act of 2023

This bill requires the Department of Defense to complete a data matching agreement with the Department of Education to ensure that current or former active-duty military service members or civilian employees who are eligible for the public service loan forgiveness program have their periods of employment (beginning on October 1, 2007) automatically certified and counted towards the program.

titles.title: Ensuring Military Access to Higher Education Benefits Act of 2023

A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to complete a data matching agreement with the Secretary of Education in order to ensure individuals who are current or former active-duty military service members or civilian employees and are otherwise eligible for assistance under the public service loan forgiveness program have their periods of employment automatically certified and counted towards the public service loan forgiveness program.
Ensuring Military Access to Higher Education Benefits Act of 2023
